allowDefaultCaseForExhaustiveSwitch.description: If 'true', allow 'default' cases on switch statements with exhaustive cases.

considerDefaultExhaustiveForUnions.description: If 'true', the 'default' clause is used to determine whether the switch statement is exhaustive for union type

defaultCaseCommentPattern.description: Regular expression for a comment that can indicate an intentionally omitted default case.

requireDefaultForNonUnion.description: If 'true', require a 'default' clause for switches on non-union types.
